snippet: A man who fired a weapon Monday night in the Garden State Plaza mall, sending thousands running, shot and killed himself early Tuesday morning, authorities said.
abstract: Richard Shoop, man who fired a weapon in the Garden State Plaza mall, sending thousands running, shoots and kills himself in secluded area of 2.1-million-square-foot complex; family and law enforcement officials believe he was not looking to take anyone’s life but his own, saying he had 'ample opportunity' to cause bloodshed but chose not to.

byline.original: By MARC SANTORA and NATE SCHWEBER
byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Emma G. Fitzsimmons, Meredith Mandell, Patrick McGeehan and Eli Rosenberg. Sheelagh McNeill contributed research.

lead_paragraph: A man who fired a weapon Monday night in the Garden State Plaza mall, sending thousands running, shot and killed himself early Tuesday morning, authorities said.

headline.main: Suicide Ends Long Night of Chaos Inside New Jersey Mall
headline.print_headline: Suicide Ends Long Night Of Chaos Inside Mall
